remarks: The strong form of the Axiom of Regularity (no sethood requirement on ` A ` ), with the axiom itself present as an antecedent.  See also ~ zfregs .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 22-Mar-2013.)
statement:
epfrs $p |- ( ( _E Fr A /\ A =/= (/) ) -> E. x e. A ( x i^i A ) = (/) ) $.
$d A x $.
